attributes.description: The School District of Philadelphia has released School Budget information for the 2019 Fiscal Year as a [collection of PDFs](https://www.philasd.org/performance/programsservices/open-data/district-information/#budget), one for each school. This Python download script (in the form of a Jupyter Notebook) aggregates these budgets and outputs them in a few CSVs.
attributes.name: school_budget_aggregator
